AboutPage.missionVisionDesc:
Our mission is to help businesses, institutions and individuals reap the benefits of technology through our innovative software and products. We strive to offer our customers and partners affordable, accessible, and secure technologies in the defense industry and information technologies.
Our vision is to be recognised as an international innovation and R&D center, to help build a sustainable future for the world by developing software and products that will accelerate digitalization globally.

items.title: Recruitment Criteria for Candidates with a Bachelor’s Degree and/or Above

content.desc: Candidates who have graduated with a bachelor's degree from domestic universities will be considered if they meet the conditions listed in the table below.
headers: ÖSYM Exam Ranking for the Evaluated Branch
Bachelor's Degree GPA Criteria on a 4.0 Scale
rows: (20,000/ÖSYM Exam Ranking) + Bachelor's GPA + Additional Points ≥ 3.00 *
content.note: * When calculating the academic average, mathematical rounding rules are applied to take two decimal places. (If the third decimal place is 5 or higher, the second decimal place is rounded up.)

content.desc: Additional points may be awarded to candidates if they meet the following additional point criteria.
rows: For candidates with 2 ≤ x < 5 years of work experience, provided their experience is related to the job description
For candidates with 5 ≤ x < 10 years of work experience, provided their experience is related to the job description

For candidates with a master's degree from domestic or foreign universities ranked within the top 1000 in Quacquarelli Symonds (QS), Round University Ranking (RUR), or Times Higher Education (THE) world university rankings, and whose degree is relevant to the job description
For candidates proficient in a foreign language (subject to the criteria in 2.8)
For candidates with other relevant master's degrees fulfilling the job description requirements
For candidates who have served as researchers or scholars in national or international projects of TÜBİTAK, the Ministry of Industry and Technology, or the European Union in their field of education
For candidates with publications in SCI, SCI Exp., or SSCI indexes
For candidates with an ALES score of 70 or above in their field of study in the last 5 years (numerical for engineering, verbal or equally weighted for administrative fields)
notes: 2. For candidates with 10 or more years of experience in administrative and engineering fields, provided their experience is related to the job description, criteria such as minimum GPA, foreign language proficiency, ÖSYM ranking, and relevance of undergraduate major to the job description are not required.

3. The conditions specified in item 1 and the additional point applications specified in Article 2.1 will apply to candidates who have graduated from domestic universities with a minimum GPA of 2.20/4.00. Candidates with a GPA below 2.20/4.00, regardless of meeting additional conditions, will not be considered. The minimum GPA requirement will not apply to candidates with 10 or more years of experience in positions related to the job description.
4. Candidates without ÖSYM University Entrance Exam rankings (such as transfer students, completion students, etc.) must have a bachelor's GPA + Additional Points ≥ 3.00/4.00.

5. Candidates graduating from foreign universities (Bachelor's, Master's, and/or Doctorate) must provide diploma equivalency documents from the Council of Higher Education (YÖK) or the Interuniversity Board. ...
6. Candidates with undergraduate degrees from distance learning and open education programs are not considered for Administrative and Engineering fields.
7. Candidates graduating from universities where GPA is not calculated on a 4.00 scale will use the approved equivalency table ...
8. Candidates will earn additional points if they meet any of the following foreign language (English) criteria. The validity period ...

IELTS-Academic ≥ 6.0, YDS/eYDS ≥ 70, Pearson PTE – Academic ≥ 71, TOEFL-IBT ≥ 84, TBA ≥ 6.0, YÖKDİL/e YÖKDİL ≥ 70, ITEP Academic Plus – Virtual Proctoring (IVP) ≥ 3.9, Cambridge CPE ≥ C, Cambridge CAE ≥ B, Versant ≥ 62, TOEIC (Reading and Listening) ≥ 732
